    com.linecorp.armeria.server.tracing
    Provides distributed tracing decorators for armeria services using Brave, a Java tracing library compatible with Zipkin.

      Methods in com.linecorp.armeria.common that return ServiceInvocationContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ServiceInvocationContext ServiceInvocationContext.current()
      Returns the context of the invocation that is being handled in the current thread.
      ServiceInvocationContext ServiceInvocationContext.onEnter(Runnable callback)
      Registers callback to be run when re-entering this ServiceInvocationContext, usually when using the makeContextAware(java.util.concurrent.Executor) family of methods.
      ServiceInvocationContext ServiceInvocationContext.onExit(Runnable callback)
      Registers callback to be run when re-exiting this ServiceInvocationContext, usually when using the makeContextAware(java.util.concurrent.Executor) family of methods.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Determines the timeout of the invocation associated with the specified ServiceInvocationContext.
